ygData.subject: i found something out
ygData.msgSnippet: well i was playing my druid today, he s level 11,  and i was fighting a snake.  out of nowhere a wiz comes along and ks ed the giant snake.  it really pissed
ygData.messageBody:
well i was playing my druid today, he's level 11, and i was fighting a
snake. out of nowhere a wiz comes along and ks'ed the giant snake. it
really pissed me off. his excuse was, i just want exp!!! i couldn't believe
it. now i see why people get so pissed off at us wizards. i guess i got
satisfaction wathcing him and his partner die. it was great. now my druid
has hatred towards wizards and looks down upon them. i like to roleplay.
now i see why wizards are hated and it's so hard to find a group. just
wanted to let you know my experience from the outside.

Parthon lvl 14 wiz
